commit message:
Include connection info in notifications

See #5

Add alternate notification text for when disconnected from Wi-Fi

Instead of showing the all zeroes address (0.0.0.0) say that the device
is not connected to any Wi-Fi network at the moment.

Fix notification text not being updated

After connecting to or disconnecting from Wi-Fi the text of the notification
wasn't updated accordingly.

Fix network connection status checks

We need to specify the type of network (i.e. Wi-Fi) to properly detect
connection status because the device can be connected to multiple networks
simultaneously.

And also refactor some stuff, like store various system services in member
variables to avoid unnecessary getSystemService() calls and use 4 spaces
to indent continuation lines.
Move common Wi-Fi info retrieval code to NetworkUtils
